bibl.title: The Court Function of the Interpreter in Genesis 42.23 and Early Greek Papyri.
bibl.note: The •rmhneutÆw in Genesis 42.23. - Chronological, Contextual, and Lexical Assumptions. - The Semantic Value of •rmnhneÊw and Its Use in Early Papyri. - Excursus: The Frequency of "Interpreter" Terms. <hermeneutes, hermeneus>
EVANS Trevor, The Court Function of the Interpreter in Genesis 42.23 and Early Greek Papyri.
Tessa RAJAK, Sarah PEARCE, James AITKEN and Jennifer DINES (Edd.), Jewish Perspectives on Hellenistic Rulers = Hellenistic Culture and Society. 50 (Berkeley - Los Angeles - London, 2007) pp. 238-252.
